llm.feedback: Your draft must be reformatted to the exact “Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %” template, adding a fifth field (“What to watch”) to each line. Replace the 2025 Q3 inflation‑spike line with 2026 Q1 (source says early 2026) and adjust the probability to ~12 % citing (LF0UUL917). Keep the Fed‑rate‑hike line at 2026 Q1 with a ~10 % probability, citing (LF0UUL917). For the Down items, use 2025 Q3 for Fed further easing and 2025 Q3 for Treasury issuance dip, each with ~30 % and ~20 % probabilities respectively, citing (LF0UUL917). Ensure each line is a single sentence, e.g., “Down | 2025 Q3 | Fed further easing | Fed minutes, CPI/PCE releases, Treasury auction results | 30 %.” Add inline citations for every factual claim (e.g., (LF0UUL917)). Remove any extraneous text and keep the output strictly to four lines.
